Peoria.WMBD-TV: WMBD-TV is a CBS-affiliated television station licensed to Peoria, Illinois, United States and serving the North-Central Illinois television market. It broadcasts a high definition digital signal on UHF channel 30 (or virtual channel 31 via PSIP) from a transmitter on Pinecrest Drive in East Peoria, a section of Groveland Township, Tazewell County. Owned by the Nexstar Media Group, WMBD operates Bloomington-licensed Fox affiliate WYZZ-TV under a local marketing agreement (LMA) with owner Cunningham Broadcasting.
